title: URF IDEA! RIOT PLEASE READ THIS BOI
body: Im no photoshop wizard but my god i believe this is the solution to the Urf problems and surely! Suuuuuurely Riot would have 0 trouble implementing this idea. Plz Rito give it a chance </3

replies.body: The community wants URF so  badly all the time and we finally get it and it's bittersweet. Just give us URF how the players want it.. far out.
Yeah, I totally agree, and you're not too bad at photoshop :)
Thank you haha :) first time use x

Honestly, I'd like to see Riot give this a shot and see how queues are affected (more specifically, ARURF). While I can certainly understand their reasoning behind ARURF, they kind of just forced it onto the community. At the very least, I'd like to see the occasional (maybe once a year) "community vote" between ARURF and traditional URF.
I agree with this tbh. Kinda stupid how its based on RNG like aram and getting into games with 0% chance of winning from the start. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I feel a bigger issue is the lack of bans in ARURF. Like I don't mind if I get shen in urf, so long as I don't have to deal with kassadin, riven or vlad.

Thats also a good idea and would defiantly make ARURF so much better if a few op urf champs got banned out and games would be more even ( I would guess) 

However i got to disagree because i feel that bans in ARURF is not the bigger problem. From what i've seen and herd is that people miss spamming there most loved champs in the game mode. Just free choice to play a tryhard spam no stress gamemode, try some stupid champ combos in lanes with your mates and most of all when you got to pick your champs the games were not as one sided as they are know (Based off my games)
When everyone is op, it balances out.
